name: 辜炳達
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生經由閱讀與討論以了解全球共同面對的課題，包括：全球化的趨勢、文化衝突與恐怖主義、全球貧富差距、環境保護問題、基因工程所衍生的倫理道德問題等等。
schedule:
W1   Thinking Globally
W2   Globalisation over Time
W3   The Rise of Ethnic Politics in a Global World
W4   Religious Politics and Antiglobalisation
W5   Global Labour and Asian Culture
W6   Global Economic Empires
W7   Global Forces in the New World
W8   The Erosion of the Nation-State
W9   Religious Politics and the New World Order
W10 Transnational Economy and Global Labour
W11 Global Finance and Financial Inequality
W12 Development and the Role of Women in the Global Economy
W13 The Hidden Global Economy of Sex and Drugs
W14 Global Environment and Health Crises
W15 Global Communications and New Media
W16 The Global Movement for Human Rights
W17 Group Presentation
W18 Group Presentation
scorePolicy:
In-class performance 20%
